name: Paint Protection Film
pagetitle: XPEL | Paint Protection Film | Clear Bra | ULTIMATE PLUS | STEALTH | TRACWRAP | ARMOR
metakeywords: XPEL, ULTIMATE PLUS, STEALTH, TRACWRAP, ARMOR, PPF, Paint Protection, Paint Protection Film, Clear Bra, Self-Healing, stone chips, rock chips, scratches, bug guts, road paint, road debris, winter weather, all season, trail rated, impact resistant
metadescription: Need clear bra? XPEL offers a variety of self-healing paint protection films and DIY solutions to keep your car looking its best.

categories.name: ULTIMATE PLUS
categories.description:
<p><strong>Gloss Is Boss</strong></p>

<p>A virtually invisible urethane film. It protects your vehicle's paint from unsightly damage and maximizes re-sale value. Some of its features include Self Healing, Stain Resistance and Superior Optical Clarity.</p>

categories.name: STEALTH
categories.description:
<p><strong>As Smooth As Satin</strong></p>

<p>Finally, a paint protection film specifically formulated for preserving protecting a flat factory finish. Whether your vehicle is matte, magno, frozen or frosted, XPEL STEALTH will keep it looking effortlessly pristine. Or, give your gloss paint a whole new look!</p>

categories.name: INTERIOR PROTECTION
categories.description:
<p><strong>Protect, Restore, Renew</strong></p>
                <p>Never lose the new car look - keep your interior surfaces free & clear of fine scratches, swirls, and blemishes with the latest Interior Protection solutions from XPEL.</p>

categories.name: TRACWRAP
categories.description:
<p><strong>Ready, Set, Protect</strong></p> 

<p>XPEL TRACWRAP is the enthusiast's choice for a DIY paint protection film solution. Don't hit the tarmac with blue tape ever again. Trust in TRACWRAP to give you the temporary coverage you need to make the drive & take pole position.</p>

categories.name: ARMOR
categories.description:
<p><strong>It's Rugged By The Roll</strong></p> 

<p>XPEL ARMOR provides a textured, bed-liner aesthetic in an easy-to-apply film that's 13 mils thick. Designed for off-road, industrial, and commercial use, ARMOR can give your rig the look you want with the protection it deserves.</p>

categories.name: LUX PLUS | LUX MAX | LUX-M | ASP | MPD | ARES
categories.description: We pride ourselves in our diverse range of product offerings for the global marketplace. LUX PLUS, LUX MAX, LUX-M, MPD, ARES and ASP protective films have been specifically formulated for peak performance abroad, offering clients the level of protection & finish quality they expect from XPEL.

categories.name: By the Foot
categories.description: Endless Possibilities   Our paint protection films are available in a wide variety of widths and lengths that are perfect for any project. From cars to trucks, to motorcycles, bicycles, skateboards, scooters, and more, XPEL film by the foot has you covered no matter what you need to protect.
